fields.title: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
fields.description: Crisp apple slices paired with creamy almond butter and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
fields.instructions:
1. Wash and slice apple into wedges
2. Remove core
3. Arrange on plate
4. Serve with almond butter for dipping
5. Sprinkle with cinnamon
6. Enjoy immediately

fields.title: Hummus with Veggie Sticks
fields.description: Creamy homemade hummus served with colorful vegetable crudit√©s.
fields.instructions:
1. Blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon, and garlic
2. Add olive oil while blending
3. Cut vegetables into sticks
4. Arrange vegetables around hummus
5. Drizzle hummus with olive oil
6. Sprinkle with paprika

fields.title: Energy Balls
fields.description: No-bake energy balls with dates, nuts, and dark chocolate chips.
